attributes.action: Not to criminalise material showing sexual practices that he doesn't approve of.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Proposed laws relating to pornography.
The criminalisation of non-abusive activities engaged in by consenting adults is not justifiable, even if a majority find them distasteful. Gay people were in this position pre-1967. 
Images will count as illegal if they are pornographic and real or realistic  and depict "serious violence". Leave our consentual sexual activities entirely up to us, mind your own business Westminster.

rejection.details: There is already a petition dealing with this.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
